metadata.synopsis: The goblins realise that the other goblins died and conclude that it must have been the player.

0.speaker: Brawler Rot, Warrior Sul, Warlock Gurk, Sharp-Eye Aggy, Tracker Grikka, Tracker Klagga, Tracker Puli, Tracker Tak
0.context: NodeContext: Panicked and angry - They think the player killed the other goblins
